TopicTitle: EPL Launchpad replacement in MKS Lite

Articles.Content:
As a followup to this question, I've started using MKS Lite instead of MKS. I had my MKS base up and running smoothly, but I found that MKS Lite is more to my taste/gameplay.

However, I cannot see the MKS launchpad anywhere? Is it not part of MKS Lite at all? Is it possible to "mod it over" somehow?

Alternatively, what's the "best" way of building/launching rockets from my Munbase via MKS Lite/EPL? I've never used the EPL parts, as I liked the look and feel of the MKS-L replacement parts.

Edited August 8, 2016 by jarmund
Thismod may interest you.  (haven't tried it myself,  but seems to be what are you looking for)
